title: Jasper
description: As Captain of an NHL team, I'm rich, successful and have women falling at my feet.I thought my life was perfect until a pint sized blonde checked into me one day, knocking my life off course.Wolfie Williams is sass personified. Beautiful, fiery, funny and oh so sexy. With every eye roll she gives me I become more and more wrapped around her finger, making me realise she is my missing piece.The only problem is she hates me and she’s heading back to England in five months.So I’m against the clock to make her understand that she can’t live without me either.
author: Lulu Moore
